thread.title: Toys 'R' Us vendors scramble for shelf life as doors shut

title: Toys 'R' Us vendors scramble for shelf life as doors shut
text:
Toys 'R' Us vendors scramble for shelf life as doors shut 4:51pm GMT - 01:41 
Toy and children furniture makers are 'exhausted' after Toys 'R' Us announced it is shutting all stores, leaving some unpaid vendors facing a bleak future and others, like Joe Shamie, president of Delta Children Products, strategizing to survive.   
Toy and children furniture makers are 'exhausted' after Toys 'R' Us announced it is shutting all stores, leaving some unpaid vendors facing a bleak future and others, like Joe Shamie, president of Delta Children Products, strategizing to survive.  //reut.rs/2pkrJ13
